root: ^Hello again friend! What brings you by?

section1: ^Then I asked the mayor if I could use it to sell food.
^He said it was fine, I just had to not dirty the beach.
^But then some time ago that other stand appeared as well.
section1A: ^Well, if the mayor let me, I don't see why he wouldn't allow him...
section1B: ^And I guess having another vendor is good company.
